nodes.text: Byss was a planet located within the galaxy's Deep Core. It was connected via hyperspace route to Prakith. It was located at the end Byss Run, and was discovered during the Old Republic. The world was considered important by Emperor Palpatine.

Byss was first created for the Star Wars: Dark Empire series of Star Wars Legends comic books, and first appeared in Dark Empire 2, which was written by Tom Veitch and released on February 18, 1992. The world was confirmed to exist in canon when it appeared on a galactic map included with Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 36, a magazine released by De Agostini in 2015.
